attributes.action: To introduce common disabilities to the curriculum for primary and secondary
attributes.additional_details: I want the goverment to do something about it because it will help disabled peoples mental health. In case they feel isolated and become over whelmed. I can say from personal experience that is incredibly worried about what people are thinking about. Although most people are accepting i want to help stop the stigma about disability . Also make people more educated in certain disabilitys which are farely unkown but wide spread around the country like Spina Bifida, autism, ocd and adhd ect.
attributes.background: To add information to the curriculum of primary and secondary schools about disabilities .To make people less ignorant about what disabilities are and stare less at physically and or mentally disabled people making them feel like an outcast and not belonging in society.
